name: Parameter
description: The Parameter class represents a parameter of a Revit element. It provides access to the parameter's value and properties.

properties.name: Element
properties.description: Gets the element that owns the parameter.

properties.name: IsReadOnly
properties.description: Indicates whether the parameter is read-only.

properties.name: IsShared
properties.description: Indicates whether the parameter is a shared parameter.

properties.name: StorageType
properties.description: Gets the storage type of the parameter.

methods.name: AsDouble()
methods.description: Gets the parameter value as a double.

methods.name: AsInteger()
methods.description: Gets the parameter value as an integer.

methods.name: AsString()
methods.description: Gets the parameter value as a string.

methods.name: AsElementId()
methods.description: Gets the parameter value as an ElementId.

methods.name: Set(Double)
methods.description: Sets the parameter value as a double.

methods.name: Set(Integer)
methods.description: Sets the parameter value as an integer.

methods.name: Set(String)
methods.description: Sets the parameter value as a string.

methods.name: Set(ElementId)
methods.description: Sets the parameter value as an ElementId.
